/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a serene street scene in Beijing, China. The viewer's perspective is that of a pedestrian standing on the sidewalk, looking down the length of the street. The street itself is flanked by lush green trees and bushes, their leaves rustling gently in the breeze. On the right side of the street, a building with a gray facade stands tall, its windows reflecting the clear blue sky above. Power lines stretch across the scene, connecting the building to the rest of the city. The sun shines brightly in the blue sky, casting a warm glow on the scene below. The image is taken from a low angle, adding a sense of depth and perspective to the view. The overall atmosphere is peaceful and inviting, a typical day in this beautiful city.
